item.title: Latest update of 1844 American songbook reflects new generation of 'Sacred Harp' singers
item.description: An 1844 religiously inspired songbook that uses shape notes to help people read music got a major update recently and it attracting younger singers.

item.title: Trump advises parents on hepatitis B vaccine. Here's why doctors say he's wrong
item.description: It's unusual for Presidents to give medical advise. But this week President Trump told parents to delay giving their kids a hep b shot until they turn...

item.title: What we know about the Dallas ICE facility shooting
item.description: A gunman fired at a Dallas ICE immigration detention facility, killing one person and injuring two others. Investigators provide updates on the shooti...

item.title: Trump is accusing the U.N. of 'sabotage.' The U.N. says Trump's team is to blame
item.description: Trump says three "sinister events" disrupted his speech: a frozen escalator, a broken teleprompter and a too-quiet sound system. The U.N. says Trump's...

item.title: Starbucks is closing more stores and laying off 900 workers
item.description: The coffee giant plans to cut 900 corporate jobs and shut down about 1% of its stores as the chain's turnaround plan approaches a one-year mark.
